[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times Soul of that Character.
[A] [Put the top card of your Stock to your Clock, send this to Memory] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Fluctlight:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] For each of your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Memories are Here" is in your Climax Zone, put the top card of your Library into Stock, and reveal the top card of your Library. If that card has a Soul Trigger Icon, you may put that card in your hand. (otherwise put it back)

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Fluctlight:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Fluctlight:: Characters.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO RECOLLECTION When this attacks, if "Mother's Rosario" is in your Climax Zone and "Asuna & Yuuki, With Memories" is in your Memory, you may pay cost. If so, put the top 11 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room, and deal 1 Damage to your Opponent X times. X equals the number of Climax cards placed in the Waiting Room by this effect. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "New World" is in the Climax Zone, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = 1 + Level of that card. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] All your other ::Fluctlight:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] Put a Marker from under this into Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, if you have 2 or more other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to their hand.
[A] When your Character reveals a Climax with a Bounce Icon during Trigger Check, if this does not have a Marker under it, you may look at the top card of your Library. If so, place that card facedown underneath this as Marker.

[C] If you have another "Alice, Sword Fissure", all your other ::Fluctlight Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card with a Bounce Trigger Icon revealed this way, choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row and move it to another empty Slot in the Front Row.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Fluctlight:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, your Opponent places all of their Stock in their Waiting Room, then puts the same number of cards from the top of their Library to Stock.
